casebody.data:
James D. HANDY, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF THE ARMY, Respondent. No. 01-3160. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 8, 2002.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, CLEVENGER and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
